article_title: 05-23-16 Sound-Off: Where are the parents of young crime offenders?
article_text:
Parents, guardians have responsibility

Get the names of lawmakers suggesting a higher income tax

Tired of social liberal agendas out of Washington

article_metadata.title: 05-23-16 Sound-Off: Where are the parents of young crime offenders? | Belleville News-Democrat

og.description: Where are the parents or guardians of the underage youth that are committing the crimes in West Belleville? Don’t they have responsibility for the actions of their children? If not why not? I read that a group of Illinois lawmakers is suggesting raising the income tax from 3.75 percent to 4.85 percent. Get the names of these tax and spend yo-yo’s and vote them out.
